metadata.title: CVE-2021-47624 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net/sunrpc: fix reference count leaks in rpc_sysfs_xprt_state_changeThe refcount leak issues take place in an error handling path. When the3rd argument buf doesn't match with "offline", "online" or "remove", thefunction simply returns -EINVAL and forgets to decrease the referencecount of a rpc_xprt object and a rpc_xprt_switch object increased byrpc_sysfs_xprt_kobj_get_xprt() andrpc_sysfs_xprt_kobj_get_xprt_switch(), causing reference count leaks ofboth unused objects.Fix this issue by jumping to the error handling path labelled without_put when buf matches none of "offline", "online" or "remove".

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
